Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns physicalResourceId, which is âDomain". For example:

{ "Ref": "your-test-domain" }

For the Amazon Cognito user pool domain your-test-domain, Ref returns the name of the user pool domain.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon CloudFront endpoint that you use as the target of the alias that you set up with your Domain Name Service (DNS) provider.
